comments:
I ran the Update Wizard in Eclipse in the background to search and find updates for my plugins. It found updates for pydev, I installed them and as usual the question to either "switch directly" or restart eclipse came. I pressed restart and during shutting down eclipse, a NullPointerException (see below) occurred.
Still, eclipse restarted again and looks ok as far as I can tell.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2007-09-24 09:45:37.468
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Process resource updates".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.ui.views.markers.internal.MarkerAdapter.buildAllMarkers(MarkerAdapter.java:262)
	at org.eclipse.ui.views.markers.internal.MarkerView.updateForContentsRefresh(MarkerView.java:561)
	at org.eclipse.ui.views.markers.internal.MarkerView$MarkerProcessJob.run(MarkerView.java:151)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)
Is this on 3.4 or an earlier release?
